title: 24 Hr. Gym, Heated Pool, Sauna, Yoga Studio, Central A/C,Quiet Area...
posting_body: ['Glendale Apartments', "Welcome to your new home at The Howard, Glendale's premier apartment community.", 'Our spacious, sophisticated, and stylish one and two-bedroom floor plans offer a unique quality and comfort unmatched by our neighbors.', 'Discover our resort-style amenities designed for your enjoyment.', 'From our sparkling, refreshing pool, dry sauna, and barbecue grill area, to our on-site laundry facility and controlled access parking, we’ve covered all the bases.', 'Now it’s time to come home and take in the quiet tranquility of our relaxing community.', 'Welcome to The Howard.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 67', 'OR Text', '67', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 972 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Oversized walk-in Closets', '- Air Conditioning', '- Cable Ready', '- Microwave', '- Dishwasher', '- Ceiling Fan(s)', '- Carpeting', '- Private Patios', '- Vinyl Plank Flooring', '- Fireplace*', '- Refrigerator', 'Community Amenities', '- Controlled Access Parking', '- Recreation Room with Billiards', '- BBQ Grills', '- 24 Hour Fitness Center', '- Sauna', '- On Site Laundry', '- Heated Pool', '- Yoga Studio', 'Pet Policy', 'We are cat and Dog friendly!!', '<3', 'There is an additional $65.00 a month for dogs and $35.00 for cats added to your rent.', 'And an additional $500.00 pet security deposit/ per pet required.', 'Income Requirements:', '3x rent', 'Office Hours', '9:00AM to 6:00PM Monday- Sunday.', 'Office closed From: 1:00PM to 2:00PM Daily for lunch', 'The Howard', '611 N Howard St, Glendale, CA, 91206', 'Photos displayed are a representation of the community but may not be of the exact apartment.', 'Availability and rental rates are updated daily, and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Please contact the property for current availability and pricing.', 'UFPTa6xrgT']
